      • manageArgument

        private static String manageArgument(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine line,
                    String argumentName)
        If the command line argument is null then it returns the value from the configuration file otherwise it overwrites the value in the configuration properties (in memory but no tin the source file) and returns that. This effectively allows the overriding of any properties in the properties file
        Parameters:
        line -
        argumentName -
        Returns:
